summary: This is going to be a collection of BAIN Conversion Files for those mods that don\'t want to be immediately BAIN-ready in their archive format.
descriptionHtml:
There are a lot of great mods out there.  Unfortunately, not all of them are packaged in such a way that they can be installed both with NMM and with Wrye Bash.  That\'s where BCF\'s come in.  A [b][color=cyan]B[/color][/b]AIN [b][color=cyan]C[/color][/b]onversion [b][color=cyan]F[/color][/b]ile is a small archive with information telling Wrye Bash how to repackage an archive to make it BAIN-ready.  It also may contain a few new files in it, for example a BAIN Wizard, telling Wrye Bash to insert it into the archive.

Currently I only have one BCF available, however I\'m hoping as other people repackage other mods, they\'ll post their BCF\'s and we can get one conglomerate collection of BCF\'s.

[size=5][url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863]SkyUI 2.0[/url][/size]
[color=orange]Usage:[/color][list][*]Download [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863]SkuUI 2.0[/url], place the archive in your \"Bash Installers\" folder.
[*]Download the SkyUI BCF, place this in the \"Bash Installers/Bain Converters\" folder.
[*]In BAIN, right click on the SkyUI archive, select Conversions > Apply > SkyUI-2-BCF-5799
[*]Wrye Bash will repackage SkyUI 2.0 for a better BAIN experience.
[/list]

[size=5][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621]Bellyache\'s Animal and Creature Pack[/url][/size]
[color=orange]Update:[/color] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=84873]wrig678[/url] has released an updated, BAIN-ready version!  He\'s even provided a Wizard for it as well.
author: Lojack
